original_text: And I tell you, make friends for yourselves by means of unrighteous wealth, so that when it fails they may receive you into the eternal dwellings.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 말하노니 불의의 재물로 친구를 사귀라 그리하면 그 재물이 없어질 때에 그들이 너희를 영주할 처소로 영접하리라

sentences.original_text: make friends for yourselves by means of unrighteous wealth,
they may receive you into the eternal dwellings.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너희를 영원한 처소로 영접하게 하려 함이라
